mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS ts FROM contat('live_', #{gamePlatform.code}, '_bet_record') WHERE settle = 1 and stat_time = #{statTime}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO live_user_day_report (account, bet_amount, valid_amount, win_amount, stat_time, game_code, game_kind, first_kind, add_time, bet_count, win_count, revenue, member_id, real_name, user_paths) SELECT ts.*, u.member_id, u.real_name, u.super_path AS user_paths FROM ( SELECT re.account, SUM(re.bet_amount) AS bet_amount, SUM(re.valid_amount) AS valid_amount, SUM(re.win_amount) AS win_amount, re.rebate_time as stat_time, #{gamePlatform.code} AS game_code, re.game_kind, re.first_kind, SYSDATE() AS add_time, COUNT(1) AS bet_count, SUM(IF(re.win_amount > 0, 1, 0)) AS win_count, SUM(re.revenue) as revenue FROM contat('live_', #{gamePlatform.code}, '_bet_record') re WHERE 1 = 1 AND re.rebate_time = #{statTime} AND re.settle = 1 GROUP BY re.account, re.game_kind) ts JOIN member u ON ts.account = u.account
